channel.title: Click Problem

item.title: Click Problem
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

case 155: //first Click npc
if (NPCID == 366) {
    if(playerHasItem(995, Integer.MAX_VALUE)) {
        deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), Integer.MAX_VALUE);
    	addItem(6587, 1);
    	sendMessage("Thank you for purchasing D-Claws.");
    } else {
        sendMessage("You don't have " + Integer.MAX_VALUE + " coins");
    }
}

You may need this method,

public boolean playerHasItem(int itemID, int amt) {
    itemID++;
    int found = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
        if (playerItems[i] == itemID) {
            if (playerItemsN[i] >= amt) {
	        return true;
	    } else {
	        found++;
            }
	 }
    }
    if (found >= amt) {
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Click Problem

item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

reyt i want to make it so u click Jerico when uve got 2147m and it gives u d claws for the 2147m how do i do this?

[code] case 155: //first Click npc
if (NPCID == 366) {
if(playerhasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerhasItem(995, 1000000)
&& playerhasItem(995, 2145000000)) {

		    deleteItem(995, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6410, 1000000);
		    deleteItem(6412, 2145000000);

		    addItem(6587, 1);
		    sM("Thank For The 2147Million And Here Are Your D Claws.");
    }

}[/code]

ive put that but it comes up with 8 problems when i try to compile
